definition: to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc

sentences.english: The solid particles were filtered from the solution.
sentences.chinese: 固體顆粒從溶液中過濾出來。

sentences.english: It is designed to filter out viruses and toxins before they attack organs.
sentences.chinese: 在病毒和毒物攻擊器官時血液純化儀就濾出病毒。

sentences.english: I dropped the bucket, and water slopped out.
sentences.chinese: 我把桶掉在地上，水都灑濾出來。

sentences.english: The colorless platelets were filtered washed with cold methanol.
sentences.chinese: 狀物過濾出來，用冷的甲醇洗滌。

sentences.english: After being filtered, the solution must be purified and concentrated .
sentences.chinese: 溶液濾出後，必須提純並濃縮。

sentences.english: Myoglobin can damage the kidneys as they filter blood out of the body.
sentences.chinese: 當腎臟將血液濾出身體時，肌紅蛋白會損傷腎臟。

sentences.english: Strain through fine-mesh sieve into large clean pot, reserving solids.
sentences.chinese: 用細眼濾網將湯汁過濾，保留濾出的固體部分。

sentences.english: Filter press for converting treatment waste into sludge cakes.
sentences.chinese: 將濾出的廢物製成泥餅的壓濾機。

sentences.english: Conversely , suspended solids are contaminants that can readily be removed through filtration.
sentences.chinese: 相反，懸浮物是指容易從水中過濾出來的物質。

sentences.english: The solids were filtered out and only the liquid passed into the glass.
sentences.chinese: 固態物質被過濾出來，只有液體流進了杯裏。

sentences.english: Difference in color of plasma filtrate in the test-group and control-group was also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 比較試驗組和對照組血漿濾出液的顏色。
